scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts four individuals engaged in agricultural labor in a field. On the left, a woman in a blue gown and white apron holds a pitchfork. Next to her, another woman in a red dress and white head covering also holds a pitchfork. In the center, a man wearing a red hat, blue tunic, and grey hose wields a scythe, appearing to be in the act of cutting crops. To the right, a man in a pink tunic and hat, also with a tool, is visible from the back. The background features stylized hills and a blue sky, with the field rendered in green with gold accents suggesting cultivated land.
